ygData.subject: Re: Watchman Drexlin quest...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Its not that the skels are NO DROP, its that they are LORE and all Ident as the same item (rather than TSkel1, Tskel2, Tskel3, Tskel4 or something
ygData.messageBody:
On Sun, 02 Jan 2000 17:09:46 -0800, you wrote:
>I have spoken to Drexlin and recived the Quest. He says he was sent to the
>Karanas to Kill some undead Brownies, and return their remains to Akannon.
>He gives you a 4 slot Box which is No Drop i belive. Last i heard this
>quest was broken because the Tiny skelitens you recive when you kill the
>undead brownies are NO DROP, so getting 4 of them and filling the box is
>not possible. He also says he is in a hurry and gives you a deadline for
>returning the full box to him. I dont think anyone is killing him when he
>spawns , just that he is rare and only spawns a certain times and then goes
>away again. hope this helps.

Its not that the skels are NO DROP, its that they are LORE and all
Ident as the same item (rather than TSkel1, Tskel2, Tskel3, Tskel4 or
something similar). Sorta like the cards quest outa akanon (take and
give this card to 5 different clockworks to get something from them.
the painfull thing is that the card he gives ya is lore. so ya get
one, do a cleaner, go back get another....)

If you managed to get all 4 skels, once you box them and hit combine,
you would get a totally dif item (prolly a "box of tiny bones" or
something).
